function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in crowded or confined spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 outbreaks and superspreading events","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation systems, enforce physical distancing, and regulate occupancy in crowded spaces","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, occupancy sensors, and ventilation control systems","People":"Employees, visitors, and close contacts","Owner":"Employers and building managers"},{"Description":"Global shortages of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure for individuals in workplaces and healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Invest in local manufacturing of PPE, implement reuse and recycling programs for PPE, and establish strategic stockpiles of PPE","Technologies":"3D printing for PPE, PPE recycling technologies, and inventory management systems","People":"Healthcare workers, employees, and frontline workers","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare institutions, and employers"},{"Description":"Unemployment due to workplace closures","Impact":"Financial and economic instability for individuals and communities","Mitigation":"Support for furloughed workers, investment in remote work infrastructure, and government assistance programs for affected individuals","Technologies":"Remote work platforms, digital skills training, and unemployment benefits systems","People":"Employees, employers, and communities","Owner":"Government agencies, employers, and community organizations"}]}
